name: 7 Deaths
description:
Made in 3 days for the Wowie Jam 3.0  with a 4 months Unity experience. Theme : Failure is progress.

You play as someone who got stuck in a dream, he needs to complete the levels until he  wakes up... Maybe....

Everytime you fail, you become stronger. Better Swords and Better Movement Abilities. But if you die 7 times, you'll be stuck in the dream FOREVER.

Will he/she be able to escape the dream ?

WASD : Move                  ESC : Pause Menu

 Space : Jump                    Space : Double Jump

Left Click : Attack          Left Shift : Dash

My YouTube Channel.
